Footer.Discover: Discover the breeding records of each known ant species
Footer.Coffee description: Thank you for supporting my work. Here you can buy me a coffee as a thank you if you'd like.

About.title: About Agora Myrmex Project
About.p-1: Agora Myrmex is an open source project that aims to collect information about known ant species. The collected information is presented in breeding records containing data about the biology, ecology, and taxonomy of each species.
About.p-2: It was born from the idea of having a place where information about known ant species could be easily accessed and consulted. The collected information is in the public domain and is available to anyone who wants to consult it.
About.p-3: Different reference websites and public domain databases were used as sources. The collected information is presented in a structured and referenced way so that anyone can consult and verify it.
About.h-3: Information about ant biology and ecology
About.m-1: My mission is to provide accurate and up-to-date information about known ant species to promote education and conservation of these insects, as well as their care for myrmecology enthusiasts.
About.f-1: Add more information about species biology and ecology
About.f-2: Include information about ant breeding and care
About.f-3: Add more educational resources and basic guides
About.i-1: Whether you're an experienced myrmecologist or just discovering the ant world, there's a place for you in our community. Join our quest to uncover the secrets of the ant world!

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.responsable text: The person responsible for collecting and processing personal data provided through the contact form on this website is
Privacy.recopiled data text: When completing the contact form, the following personal data may be collected:
Privacy.purpose text: The data provided through the contact form will be used exclusively to respond to queries sent by the user.
Privacy.conservation text: The data will be stored only for the time necessary to address the request and will not be shared with third parties or used for commercial purposes.
Privacy.user rights text: As a user, you have the right to:
Privacy.user rights item 1: Access, rectify or delete your personal data.
Privacy.user rights item 3: Request the portability of your data.
Privacy.user rights add: To exercise these rights, you can send a request to
Privacy.security text: Security measures have been implemented to ensure the protection of personal data sent through the form.
Privacy.contact text: If you have questions about this privacy policy, you can write to
